sentences.en: a permanently damaged knee joint
sentences.cn: 永久性损伤的膝关节

sentences.en: Are you sure this joint is completely tight?
sentences.cn: 你能肯定这连接处封得很严 吗 ?

sentences.en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
sentences.cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

sentences.en: Both companies are involved in the joint development of a new medium-sized car.
sentences.cn: 两家公司联合开发一款新的中型汽车。

sentences.en: Both parties must sign the form if the account is to be in joint names(= belong to two named people ).
sentences.cn: 如果这是联名账户的话，双方都必须在表格上签名。

sentences.en: Cut the stem cleanly, just beneath a leaf joint.
sentences.cn: 把茎切整齐点, 正好切在叶根下.

sentences.en: Defense experts say joint projects are increasingly squeezed by budget pressures.
sentences.cn: 国防专家说合作项目正迫于预算压力越来越受到压缩。

sentences.en: He carved the joint of beef.
sentences.cn: 他切开了那一大块烤牛肉。

sentences.en: Her sister-in-law's nose is a little out of joint.
sentences.cn: 她嫂子有点儿心烦。

sentences.en: I had a bad fall, which put my shoulder out of joint.
sentences.cn: 我重重地摔了一跤, 肩膀脫臼了.

sentences.en: It was also agreed to reactivate two joint committees on negotiations.
sentences.cn: 磋商中还达成了重启两个联委会的决议。

sentences.en: Manchester United and Arsenal are joint favourites to win the title (= are thought to have the same chance of winning ).
sentences.cn: 曼联和阿森纳均为夺冠的热门球队。

sentences.en: Many remedies effective in joint disease are primarily diuretic.
sentences.cn: 许多对关节病有效的药品主要含有利尿成分。

sentences.en: The ensuing row snarled up the work of the joint peace commission.
sentences.cn: 随后的争吵把联合和平委员会的工作搅得一团糟。

sentences.en: The meal was a joint effort(= two or more people worked on it together ).
sentences.cn: 这顿饭是大家一起做的。

sentences.en: The two ministers have issued a joint statement.
sentences.cn: 两位部长发布了一项联合声明。

sentences.en: There was something out of joint in the situation. Something was strange.
sentences.cn: 情况有点儿不太正常。有些事有点儿古怪。

sentences.en: They had come to the world's most famous pick-up joint.
sentences.cn: 他们来到了全世界最有名的寻花问柳之地。

sentences.en: This painting is their joint work.
sentences.cn: 这幅画是他们合作的.

sentences.en: We could see the oil bleeding out from the joint.
sentences.cn: (那时)我们可以看出油从接缝处渗出.

sentences.en: We wrote a letter in joint names.
sentences.cn: 我们联名写了封信.

sentences.en: What should I use to seal the joint between the carport roof and the house wall?
sentences.cn: 我应该用什么材料填补车棚顶和房屋墙面的接缝？

words.tran_cn: 有接缝的；有节的，有关节的
接洽人；接合物；刨接缝的长刨
寡妇所得遗产；（丈夫生前指定的）由妻子继承的遗产；连接
连接，贴合（joint的过去式和过去分词形式）
共同的,共有的,合作的,协作的,同意的,一致的
连接的,接合的,联合的,合办的
接合,接头,榫,接缝,接合处,关节
肢解,拆卸,使脱离,切开,劈开,分离
连接，贴合；[建]接合；使有接头

phrases.tran_cn: 伸缩缝；补偿器；伸缩接头；膨胀节或缝
联合行动；[机]接合动作；接合作用
精神沮丧的，心情不好的；脾气坏的
n. 中外合资企业；中外合资经营

trans.tran_cn: 共同的，联合的，共享的，两院的，连带的，共同的
trans.tran_en: involving two or more people or groups, or owned or shared by them

trans.tran_cn: [解]关节，接合处，下流场所，一块烤肉（英式英语）
trans.tran_en: a part of your body that can bend because two bones meet there

trans.tran_cn: 连接，贴合；接合；使有接头
结合，联合，为…装上接头，使…有接缝
